duties_responsibilities.duty: Providing outstanding customer service and engaging customers warmly and professionally.
Using suggestive selling techniques and meeting solicitation goals for loyalty programs.
Utilizing technology to enhance the customer shopping experience and complete sales.
Meeting personal sales goals and reducing shrinkage in the area.
Maintaining store standards, appearance, and assisting with operational tasks.
Assisting with non-sell duties as assigned by the Sales Team Manager.

education_certification.credential: No education requirement. Experience in retail preferred
